mapper.sql: id, video_id, author_id, content, reply_cnt, create_time
${alias}.id, ${alias}.video_id AS videoId, ${alias}.author_id AS authorId, ${alias}.content, ${alias}.reply_cnt AS replyCnt, ${alias}.create_time AS createTime,
mapper.select: SELECT vc.id, u.name, u.avatar, vc.author_id authorId, vc.content, vc.reply_cnt replyCnt, vc.create_time createTime FROM video_cmt vc LEFT JOIN user u ON vc.author_id = u.id WHERE vc.video_id = #{videoId} ORDER BY vc.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size}
mapper.update: UPDATE video_cmt SET reply_cnt = reply_cnt + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
